text.head: CORAM: HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE VINOD GOEL R D E R 18.12.2018
text.p: 1. Allowed, subject to all just exceptions.

2. A short affidavit of Sh. Subhash Chand, SDM (Seemapuri),
Delhi along with demarcation report dated 13.03.2018 has been filed.
The Report records 'Khasra Nos. 976, 977, 978 & 979 are falling on
Eastern side, more than 100 meters away from the Concerned
property/Land in Question'. It is, thus, evident that the land consisting
of Khasra Nos. 976, 977, 978 & 979, which DDA claimed to be its
property, is 100 meters away from the property in question.

3.In these circumstances, since the demarcation has already been
carried out, learned counsel for the petitioner does not press this
petition and seeks liberty to take appropriate action as per law.

4. The petition and all pending applications are dismissed as
withdrawn with such liberty.
5. Next date of hearing i.e. 3.5.2019 stands cancelled.
